p: Of the 5413 Zika virus disease cases (excluding congenital cases) reported in the United States for January 2015 to December 6, 2017, 95% were travel related and 99% were vector borne. Of the 51 cases that were not vector borne, 94% were attributed to sexual transmission, 1 due to laboratory transmission, and 1 unknown route ( https://www.cdc.gov/zika).
